name: Anti Aircraft Artillery (Playdate)
description:
This game has not been tested on the Playdate hardware yet.

Anti Aircraft Artillery is a turret-based, arcade-style shooter where you are tasked with defending yourself against an endless attack of kamikaze planes. Test your skills and see how long you can survive! 

Controls:

  • D-pad(UP or DOWN) + Crank OR D-pad(UP or DOWN): Adjust Vertical Aim
  • D-pad(LEFT or RIGHT) + Crank OR D-pad(LEFT or RIGHT): Adjust Horizontal Aim
  • Ⓐ: Fire Machine Gun
  • Ⓑ: Fire Cannon

You can modify the aiming inputs and inversions from the control screen at any time.

Build:

Version 0.1.0 of Anti Aircraft Artillery is compiled for the Playdate Windows Simulator, working on the Playdate device integration.
